nodes.bodyText:
this doesn't seem like a robust approach. I have two concerns:

is it possible that this runs concurrently with the namenodes starting, in which case neither NN is active yet?
it's definitely possible that one of the NNs fails around the same time these two scripts are running. In that case either neither or both of the copies of this script will run.

it seems this script should be idempotent. How often does it get re-run? eg if for some reason we hit one of the above issues, would it run again a minute later and just be a transient problem, or would we be left in a persistent unsynced state?
